definition: Mt Mao, Daoist mountain southeast of Jurong county 句容[Ju4 rong2], Jiangsu Province
reeds/rushes
surname Mao
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Mountain Mao is in Liyang, Jiangsu Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 茅山坐落于中国江苏省溧阳市。

sentences.english: For example, the Mao Shan Daoist Life Nourishing Company is currently enjoying a test run.
sentences.chinese: 目前已有茅山道家养生有限公司，正在试验经营。

sentences.english: The culture of Taoism effect his life from his infancy to his privacy live.
sentences.chinese: 道教文化对顾况的影响是从幼年直到他老年归隐茅山。
